summary:
This mod will add mash-up armors into Skyrim.

All armor sets are gender friendly.

The collection will consist of both heavy and light armors.

Unique light versions will be added for "heavy" exclusive armors and the same goes for "light" exclusive armors.

New armors will be added so
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][u]This mod is no longer being worked on. Go here for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68144/?]newest[/url] version.[/u][/size][/center]
Mod: Immersive armor Mashups
Author: Bryanwee20
Date: 19/1/2014
Forum Link: http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1323147-mega-armor-mash-up-collection/

Introduction:
This mod first started out as a collection of personally modded armor sets in my external HDD. As it is now, there are a total of 12 - 15 misc armor sets lying around. So I decided to get them in order and put them to actual use. If you like what you have seen here please drop by the forum and leave a comment. Pitch in your own ideas on what you think is missing from the game or what can be improved on in this mod. Your comments will be greatly appreciated.

Mod Details:
Current Version includes 6 different armors, most of which are already published as single files.
These include light and heavy armors. All armor sets have both gender support. Each armor can be found at the forge and are temperable. Each version released will include an additional 6 armors>

Progress Log:

Version 1.0
Added Scarlet Assassin
Added Argonian Hunter
Added Rogue Nord
Added Noble Rogue
Added Nord Beserker
Added Ivory Warrior


Version 2.0
Added Orc Marauder
Added Rugged Scout
Added Slaver
Added Wanderer
Added Tamer

Changes in Version 2.0
Texture fix for Beserker iron armor
Texture fix for 1st person noble rogue

Things to do:
Add Armors into leveled lists
Fix lighting bugs on witch hunter/marauder/ivory warrior helmet

NOTE:
If you're experiencing any missing texture issue please Download Cabal's Book of silence:

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?


Credits:
CaBaL120 : For being such a cool dude for allowing me to use his mind-blowing textures from his admidianborn series (Total EPIC-NESS!!).

My crappy school laptop: For not crashing anymore.
author: Bryanwee20
